title: cant join games, now locked out for being booted from 2 lobbies

replies.body:
5 minute lockout, followed immediately by a half hour lockout.

What the %%%% riot?
IDK Probably deserved it with your attitude

seems like the comment of somebody who hasnt had to suffer riots incompetence, try accepting a match, being told you're in a game but the lobby doesnt appear, then being booted for not picking a champ, having that happen a few times, trying every trick in the old wrenchmans toolbox, and having it re-occur. 

just no.
